title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user (Student, Instructor, Company Admin, Super Admin) can register successfully with valid data.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input valid registration details for each user role
Submit the registration form
Verify registration success and email verification prompt (if applicable)
Verify the new user is created with the correct role and profile data in the system

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Ensure users can login successfully with valid credentials according to role.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username/email and password for each role
Click login button
Confirm successful login and redirection to respective dashboards based on role

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users can only access features and pages permitted by their assigned roles.

steps.description: Login as each user role (Student, Instructor, Company Admin, Super Admin)
Attempt to access unauthorized dashboard or management pages
Confirm access is denied with proper error messages or redirection
Access allowed sections and verify all permitted features and UI elements are functional
Confirm users can perform role-appropriate actions successfully

title: Course Creation by Instructor
description: Test that an instructor can create a course with all required fields and publish it.

steps.description: Login as an Instructor
Navigate to the course creation interface
Input valid course details including title, description, lessons, labs, assignments, quizzes
Upload all course content files (notes, FAQs) except excluded types
Publish the course
Confirm course is created, visible in public course catalog, and editable by instructor

title: Course Bundling by Instructor
description: Verify that instructors can bundle multiple courses into a single package and manage it.

steps.description: Login as an Instructor
Navigate to bundle creation functionality
Select multiple existing courses and define bundle details
Publish bundle
Verify bundle appears in public bundle catalog and is purchasable
Edit the bundle to modify courses or pricing
Confirm bundle updates persist and are accurately reflected

title: Browsing and Filtering Courses in Catalog
description: Check that users can browse the course catalog and filter courses by various criteria.

steps.description: Navigate to the course catalog page
Use filters such as category, level, instructor, price range, rating
Verify catalog results update correctly reflecting filters
Select a course to view detailed course page
Confirm course details, lessons summary, and related bundles are displayed

title: Successful Payment Process for Single Course
description: Ensure that students can enroll by paying via Stripe and PayPal with valid payment details, and enrollment is recorded.

steps.description: Login as Student
Navigate to a course enrollment payment page
Enter valid payment details for Stripe
Complete payment and confirm transaction
Verify payment success message, enrollment record created, and access granted to course
Repeat payment with valid PayPal account
Confirm enrollment and access as above

title: Applying Coupons and Discounts at Payment
description: Verify that valid coupons and discounts are accepted and applied correctly to reduce payment amount.

steps.description: Login as Student
Go to course or bundle payment page
Enter valid coupon code
Confirm discount amount is correctly calculated and displayed
Proceed to payment with discounted amount via Stripe or PayPal
Verify payment success and enrollment with applied discount
Enter invalid or expired coupon
Verify error message and discount is not applied

title: Bulk Enrollment and Discount for Corporate Package
description: Test corporate clients purchasing bulk packages with discounts, enrolling multiple employees at once.

steps.description: Login as Company Admin
Browse corporate packages and select bulk purchase
Add multiple employees to enroll
Apply corporate discounts as per rules
Complete payment via supported gateways
Verify payment success, enrollment of all employees, and discount applied
View employee progress and billing information in company dashboard
Confirm progress reports and billing data accuracy

title: Course Player Content Consumption and Progress Tracking
description: Verify students can navigate lessons, labs, assignments, quizzes and progress is tracked correctly.

steps.description: Login as Student with active enrollment in a course
Open course player and navigate through lessons, labs, and assignments
Complete quizzes with valid answers
Verify progress updates in dashboard and course player accurately reflect completion
Leave notes and view course specific FAQs
Confirm notes save correctly and FAQs are accessible

title: Automated Certificate Generation and Download
description: Ensure certificates are automatically issued upon course completion and can be downloaded as PDFs and shared.

steps.description: Complete all course requirements as a Student
Confirm automated certificate generation triggers successfully
Navigate to certificates section in student dashboard
Download the certificate PDF
Check PDF is correctly formatted and includes relevant certificate details
Share certificate to social media using platform option
Verify sharing completes without errors

title: Student Review Submission and Moderation
description: Test students can submit reviews and ratings on courses, which are displayed after moderation.

steps.description: Login as Student enrolled in a course
Submit a review with rating and comments for the course
Verify review is recorded and pending moderation
Login as Admin
Access review moderation panel and approve/reject submitted reviews
Confirm approved reviews are displayed publicly for the course
Verify rejected reviews do not appear in course pages

title: Instructor Dashboard Course and Earnings Management
description: Verify instructors can monitor course enrollments, student progress, and view earnings report accurately.

steps.description: Login as Instructor
Navigate to Instructor Dashboard
View list of created courses and enrollment stats
Access individual student progress reports
Open earnings report section and verify earnings data for courses and bundles
Confirm accuracy and consistency of displayed data

title: Admin Dashboard User and Content Management
description: Test that admins can manage users, approve/reject content, and view platform analytics.

steps.description: Login as Super Admin
Manage user accounts: search, edit roles, deactivate/reactivate users
Approve or reject instructor uploaded courses, bundles, and content
Manage payment transactions and refund requests
Generate and analyze revenue and usage analytics reports
Verify all management actions persist and analytics reflect accurate data

title: Error Handling for Invalid Payment Information
description: Verify proper error messages are shown for invalid payment details or payment failures.

steps.description: Proceed to course payment page
Enter invalid credit card number or PayPal credentials
Attempt to submit payment
Verify payment is declined with meaningful error message
Enter expired or insufficient funds card details
Confirm payment failure and clear error feedback to user

title: Student Dashboard Course Progress and Continuation
description: Check that students can view progress, access ongoing courses, and resume where left off.

steps.description: Login as Student with multiple course enrollments
Open student dashboard and check progress indicators for each course
Select a course and verify player resumes from last accessed lesson/quiz
Confirm progress updates on course completion and reflected on dashboard

title: Company Dashboard Employee Management
description: Verify Company Admins can add, remove, and assign courses to employees and monitor progress.

steps.description: Login as Company Admin
Access company dashboard employee management section
Add new employee accounts and assign courses or bundles
Remove employees or modify course assignments
View aggregated and per-employee progress reports
Validate all updates persist and progress data reflects real-time usage

title: Security: Data Protection and 2FA Enforcement
description: Verify platform encryption, data privacy measures, and enforce Two-Factor Authentication for users.

steps.description: Attempt login with 2FA-enabled account
Confirm 2FA challenge prompt appears after valid password entry
Enter correct 2FA code
Verify successful login and access
Attempt access to user data as unauthorized user
Verify access denied and error logged

title: UI Responsiveness and Navigation Smoothness
description: Test all major UI flows operate smoothly and responsively on different devices and screen sizes.

steps.description: Access homepage, course catalog, course details, dashboards, and player on desktop and mobile
Verify all UI elements render properly and navigation between pages is smooth without errors
Perform interactions like filter application, content playback, and form submissions
Confirm UI responsiveness, feedback animations, and load times meet performance standards
